Table.Name: glimpse2_hrc
Table.Description: Contains the parameters provided for each source in the GLIMPSEII Highly Reliable Catalog

Column.Name: srcName
Column.Description: GLIMPSEI Highly Reliable Catalogue source name

Column.Name: seqNo
Column.Description: sequential object number in the HRC

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

Column.Name: tmassName
Column.Description: Source name from 2MASS All-Sky point source catalog (PSC)

Column.Name: tmassID
Column.Description: Unique identification number for the 2MASS source from the 2MASS All-Sky PSC

Column.Name: magJ_err
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC J Band 1 sigma error

Column.Name: magH_err
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC H Band 1 sigma error

Column.Name: magKs_err
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC Ks Band 1 sigma error

Column.Name: FJ_err
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC J Band 1 sigma error

Column.Name: FH_err
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC H Band 1 sigma error

Column.Name: FKs_err
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC Ks Band 1 sigma error

Column.Name: F3_6_rms
Column.Description: RMS deviation of the individual detections from the final flux for 3.6um IRAC (Band 1)

Column.Name: F4_5_rms
Column.Description: RMS deviation of the individual detections from the final flux for 4.5um IRAC (Band 2)

Column.Name: F5_8_rms
Column.Description: RMS deviation of the individual detections from the final flux for 5.8um IRAC (Band 3)

Column.Name: F8_0_rms
Column.Description: RMS deviation of the individual detections from the final flux for 8.0um IRAC (Band 4)

Column.Name: N3_6
Column.Description: Number of possible detections for 3.6um IRAC (Band 1)

Column.Name: N4_5
Column.Description: Number of possible detections for 4.5um IRAC (Band 2)

Column.Name: N5_8
Column.Description: Number of possible detections for 5.8um IRAC (Band 3)

Column.Name: N8_0
Column.Description: Number of possible detections for 8.0um IRAC (Band 4)

Column.Name: SQFJ
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC J Band Source Quality Flag

Column.Name: SQFH
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC H Band Source Quality Flag

Column.Name: SQFKs
Column.Description: 2MASS All-Sky PSC Ks Band Source Quality Flag

Table.Name: glimpse_hrc_inter
Table.Description: Contains the parameters provided for each source in the GLIMPSE Highly Reliable Catalog (intermediate)

Column.Name: srcName
Column.Description: GLIMPSE Highly Reliable Catalogue source name

Column.Name: seqNo
Column.Description: sequential object number in the HRC

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

Column.Name: F1_rms
Column.Description: RMS dev. of detection from F1

Column.Name: F2_rms
Column.Description: RMS dev. of detection from F2

Column.Name: F3_rms
Column.Description: RMS dev. of detection from F3

Column.Name: F4_rms
Column.Description: RMS dev. of detection from F4

Column.Name: sky1
Column.Description: Local sky bkg. for band 1 flux

Column.Name: sky2
Column.Description: Local sky bkg. for band 2 flux

Column.Name: sky3
Column.Description: Local sky bkg. for band 3 flux

Column.Name: sky4
Column.Description: Local sky bkg. for band 4 flux

Column.Name: N1
Column.Description: Possible number of detections for band 1

Column.Name: N2
Column.Description: Possible number of detections for band 2

Column.Name: N3
Column.Description: Possible number of detections for band 3

Column.Name: N4
Column.Description: Possible number of detections for band 4

Column.Name: SQL1
Column.Description: Source Quality Flag for band 1 flux

Column.Name: SQL2
Column.Description: Source Quality Flag for band 2 flux

Column.Name: SQL3
Column.Description: Source Quality Flag for band 3 flux

Column.Name: SQL4
Column.Description: Source Quality Flag for band 4 flux

Column.Name: MF1
Column.Description: Flux calc mathod flag for band 1 flux

Column.Name: MF2
Column.Description: Flux calc mathod flag for band 2 flux

Column.Name: MF3
Column.Description: Flux calc mathod flag for band 3 flux

Column.Name: MF4
Column.Description: Flux calc mathod flag for band 4 flux
